name: Fernando Gómez
message: Abro paraguas paaguas: Clean Code es un libro obsoleto que en 2020, con los paradigmas de desarrollo de software que manejamos, puede hacerte más daño que beneficio.

name: Daniel Shiffman
message: Just deployed my new web app! It feels great to see months of hard work come to life. #webdevelopment #coding

name: Dan Abramov
message: Started learning React.js today. Any tips for a beginner?

name: John Washam
message: Excited to attend the upcoming web development conference. Can't wait to learn new techniques and network with fellow developers!

name: GitHub's official mascot
message: Just published a new blog post on advanced CSS techniques. Check it out and let me know your thoughts!

name: Jake Wharton
message: Working on a complex JavaScript project. Feeling challenged but determined to overcome any obstacles. #codinglife

name: Donne Martin
message: Web design inspiration can be found everywhere! Taking a walk in nature always helps spark new creative ideas.

name: Hadley Wickham,
message: Started building a full-stack web application using Node.js, Express, and React. It's going to be an exciting journey!

name: Addy Osmani
message: User experience is key! Remember to put yourself in the user's shoes when designing your next web project.

name: Linus Torvalds
message: Excited about the latest updates to the Linux kernel! Working together with an incredible community of contributors makes it all possible. #OpenSource #Linux

name: Bill Gates
message: Just had an inspiring conversation with some brilliant minds in the tech industry. The potential for technology to drive positive change in the world is limitless! #TechForGood

name: Martin Fowler
message: Continuously learning and exploring new concepts in software architecture. The world of software development is ever-evolving, and staying curious is the key to staying ahead. #SoftwareArchitecture #ContinuousLearning

name: Brendan Eich
message: JavaScript keeps evolving, and it's amazing to witness the advancements in the language. Looking forward to the future of web development and the possibilities it brings! #JavaScript #WebDevelopment

name: Guido van Rossum
message: Python has come a long way since its inception. It's incredible to see how the community has embraced the language and made it one of the most popular choices for developers worldwide. #Python #CommunityLove

name: Kent Beck
message: Test-driven development has been a game-changer for me. Writing tests first not only improves code quality but also boosts confidence in the software we build. #TDD #CodeQuality

name: Jeff Dean
message: Just wrapped up an exciting project using machine learning techniques to solve a complex problem. The power of AI continues to amaze me! #MachineLearning #AI

name: Rob Pike
message: Concurrency and parallelism are crucial in modern systems. Exploring new approaches to make software more efficient and scalable. #Concurrency #SoftwareEngineering

name: John Resig
message: JavaScript is everywhere! It's incredible to see the impact it has had on web development and beyond.
